# tf.io.gfile.isdir


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/io/gfile/isdir">
  <img src="https://www.tensorflow.org/images/tf_logo_32px.png" />
  TensorFlow 2 version</a>
</td>

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.15/tensorflow/python/lib/io/file_io.py#L585-L596">
    <img src="https://www.tensorflow.org/images/GitHub-Mark-32px.png" />
    View source on GitHub

</td></table>



Returns whether the path is a directory or not.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/io/gfile/isdir"><code>tf.compat.v1.io.gfile.isdir</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/io/gfile/isdir"><code>tf.compat.v2.io.gfile.isdir</code></a>


``` python
tf.io.gfile.isdir(path)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Args:


* <b>`path`</b>: string, path to a potential directory


#### Returns:

True, if the path is a directory; False otherwise
